desc: Small-batch chocolatier, creator of feel-good flavours. Best handmade chocolate in the North East. Artisan chocolatier based in North Shields UK.

layout.text: Small-batch chocolatier, creator of feel-good flavours

Please note our shop and website are currently closed while we take a short summer break. The shop will re-open on Friday 19th August and the website will be restocked on Sunday 21st August at 7pm! Enjoy the sunshine folks!
